items.title: The Guardian
items.description: The Guardian is a British national daily newspaper. Founded in 1821, it was known as The Manchester Guardian until 1959.

items.title: Huffington Post
items.description: The Huffington Post is an American online news aggregator and blog.

items.title: BBC News
items.description: BBC News is an operational business division[1] of the British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC) responsible for the gathering and broadcasting of news and current affairs.
